narrative_osint.incident_summary: A 14-year-old female was last seen at Prince William at 2025-09-28T01:06:25.587387+00:00. The child was reported missing by neighbor after failing to meet a friend.

narrative_osint.movement_cues_text: Within 4 hours of disappearance, movement cues turned onto US-58 east toward Suffolk suggest travel southbound along US-58. A dark blue 2012 Toyota Camry was observed departing near Prince William, Virginia.

witness_accounts.description: Around 4 hours later, a parent reported someone matching the description (14-year-old female, wearing greenish-colored hoodie, denim pants, red Crocs) near Alleghany.

provenance._fulltext: A 14-year-old female was last seen at Prince William at 2025-09-28T01:06:25.587387+00:00. The child was reported missing by neighbor after failing to meet a friend. Within 4 hours of disappearance, movement cues turned onto US-58 east toward Suffolk suggest travel southbound along US-58. A dark blue 2012 Toyota Camry was observed departing near Prince William, Virginia. Around 4 hours later, a parent reported someone matching the description (14-year-old female, wearing greenish-colored hoodie, denim pants, red Crocs) near Alleghany.
